fields_of_interest: International co-operation and development, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation
eu_initiatives:
I European Strategy for Plastics in a Circular Economy 
II The Ocean Cleanup develops technology to recover plastics from both the high seas and other waterways.
organisation_name: Stichting The Ocean Cleanup (The Ocean Cleanup)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: TOC is not a membership organization nor is it itself a member of any other platform/network
